dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach decisions based on objective evidence and sound reasoning, weighing pros and cons thoroughly.
Your FarTwin will make decisions based on gut feelings, instincts, and personal values, trusting their emotional intelligence.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize financial spending?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on saving money, investing wisely, and reducing unnecessary expenses to achieve financial security.
Your FarTwin will prioritize enjoying life's luxuries, spending freely on experiences and material possessions that bring them joy.

dimensions.label: Environmental Stance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach environmental issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take a cautious and gradual approach to addressing environmental concerns, prioritizing sustainability over radical change.
Your FarTwin will be an outspoken advocate for drastic action on climate change and environmental issues, pushing for immediate transformation.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach education and self-improvement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer a structured learning environment, following established curricula and adhering to traditional teaching methods.
Your FarTwin will approach learning as an experiential journey, preferring hands-on activities and self-directed exploration to absorb new knowledge.

dimensions.label: Home Life Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin maintain a home?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize simplicity and decluttering, keeping living spaces clean and organized with minimal possessions.
Your FarTwin will decorate and furnish their home to showcase personal style, indulging in comfort and extravagance.

dimensions.label: Work Ethic
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach work and productivity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for excellence in their work, setting high standards and meticulously executing tasks to meet those expectations.
Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility and adaptability in the workplace, taking a casual approach to meeting deadlines and completing tasks.

dimensions.label: Social Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with friends and family?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be the center of attention, effortlessly connecting with others and dominating social conversations.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key settings, recharging alone before engaging in social interactions.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on traditional forms of artistic expression, such as painting or playing a musical instrument, to convey emotions.
Your FarTwin will explore unorthodox and avant-garde creative outlets, pushing boundaries with innovative techniques and mediums.
